item.title: Chapter 1: Foundations of Data Systems
item.author: shantanu@shantanugoel.com (Shantanu Goel)
item.description: Foundations of Data Systems # 3 Importatant Characteristics of Data Systems # Reliability: System should continue to work correctly even in the face of adversity and maintain same perf levels Scalability: As the ssytem grows, there should be reasonable ways to deal with the growth Maintainability: Different people should be able to work on it productively across time Reliability # This can include: Performing expected functions correctly Tolerate user mistakes or unexpected inputs Maintain good enough performance under load Prevent unauthorized access and abuse Types of faults:
